stories.text:
I currently have speakers hooked up to an Echo Dot which I control via Spotify Connect from my phone/laptop etc.

It’s fine but I was wondering if anyone has ever set up a ‘permanent’ Spotify controller (eg a tablet set up only to Spotify or similar), rather than always using a multi-app device like a phone to control music?
stories.title: Ask HN: Has anyone built a Spotify controller?
Seedship – A Game by John Ayliff
HK's Lam invokes security law when asked about legality of remembering Tiananmen

stories.text:
I'm bad at marketing but very good at being persistent. I was contacting a few influencers, smaller ones, and I was very persistent. I really wanted them to try my web app. Just to see what will happen.

Most of them rejected, maybe 2 accepted, but only one really tried it out. I tol him that I won't take any percentage from his earnings.

Yesterday I found out that an article was written about him and my site. I was amazed to be honest, didn't expect that at all https://theunited.news/article/this-tiktok-influencer-earned-dollar10000-from-challenges/4567
stories.title: I persuaded an influencer to try out my web app and it was worth it
